title: The attourneys academy, or, The manner and forme of proceeding practically vpon any suite, plaint or action whatsoever, in any court of record whatsoever, within this kingdome : especially in the great courts at Westminster, to whose motion all other court of law or equitie ... are diurnally mooued : with the moderne and most vsuall fees of the officers and ministers of such courts / publisht  by his Maiesties speciall priuiledge ... [by] Tho. Povvell.
author: Powell, Thomas, 1572?-1635?
publisher: Printed for Beniamin Fisher: and are to be sold at his Shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot,
notes: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
